content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Providing customized learning paths based on student's goals",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a system of recommendations using algorithm-based suggestions based on goals",
    "content_solution": "Create courses that cater to the student's preferred learning style, and provide personalized feedback on their progress",
    "competitors": ["Khan Academy", "Coursera", "Udemy"],
    "differentiator": "Tailored recommendations based on individual goals"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Meal planning and grocery list optimization",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a meal planning app that generates a grocery list based on recipes input by the user",
    "content_solution": "Create an online course that teaches users how to plan meals more efficiently and on a budget",
    "competitors": ["Mealime", "Plan to Eat", "Cook Smarts"],
    "differentiator": "Emphasis on cost-effective planning and budgeting"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Simplifying tax preparation",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a user-friendly tax preparation app that guides users through the process of filing their taxes",
    "content_solution": "Create a comprehensive tax preparation course that teaches users how to file their taxes independently",
    "competitors": ["TurboTax", "H&R Block", "TaxAct"],
    "differentiator": "Simplicity of the program and user-friendly interface"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Remote team communication",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a communication platform that allows remote teams to easily collaborate and share files",
    "content_solution": "Create a course that teaches remote team members how to communicate effectively and avoid common communication problems",
    "competitors": ["Slack", "Microsoft Teams", "Zoom"],
    "differentiator": "Emphasis on remote communication best practices and team-building exercises"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Automating social media posts and analytics",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a social media management platform that automates posting and provides analytics",
    "content_solution": "Create a course that teaches social media management best practices and how to effectively use automation tools",
    "competitors": ["Hootsuite", "Buffer", "Sprout Social"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on affordable pricing and practical tips for small businesses"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Home organization and decluttering",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a decluttering app that recommends daily tasks to organize the home",
    "content_solution": "Create a course that teaches home organization and decluttering techniques",
    "competitors": ["Marie Kondo", "The Home Edit", "FlyLady"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on practical and achievable tips for busy individuals"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Stress management and relaxation techniques",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a stress management app that provides guided meditations and relaxation techniques",
    "content_solution": "Create a course that teaches stress management techniques and how to incorporate mindfulness into daily life",
    "competitors": ["Headspace", "Calm", "Ten Percent Happier"],
    "differentiator": "Emphasis on scientifically-backed techniques for reducing stress and anxiety"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Improved sleep quality",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a sleep tracking app that provides personalized recommendations for better sleep",
    "content_solution": "Create a course that teaches healthy sleep habits and relaxation techniques for better sleep quality",
    "competitors": ["Fitbit", "Sleep Cycle", "Oura Ring"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on natural remedies and lifestyle changes to improve sleep quality"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Better time management",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a time management app that helps users prioritize tasks and create schedules",
    "content_solution": "Create a course that teaches time management techniques and how to create an effective schedule",
    "competitors": ["Trello", "Asana", "Todoist"],
    "differentiator": "Emphasis on practical tips for balancing work and personal life"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Digital privacy and security",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a privacy and security app that secures personal data and passwords",
    "content_solution": "Create a course that teaches digital privacy best practices and how to protect personal data online",
    "competitors": ["LastPass", "NordVPN", "Dashlane"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on user-friendly interface and affordable pricing for individuals and small businesses"
  }
]
